name: Ape 2 AI
description:
This is a school project for CIU 211 at SAE Media Institute.

Our project centres around the idea of transhumanism, while touching on a variety of other media concepts such as Mediated Violence, Gender roles.

Transhumanism is a philosophical movement advocating for the enhancement of the human condition by developing and making widely available sophisticated technologies able to greatly enhance longevity, mood and cognitive abilities.

Our game takes place from prehistoric time to an inevitable dystopian future, where you play the role of Adam, and as the ambassador of mankind you will use your human instincts to kill, as you evolve from an Ape to a Female AI Robot, cause let's face it, women are smarter than men ;) as this Lady Bot kicks arse!

Objective:
In this game you will need to kill the multiple enemies from various epochs, while avoiding their attacks.

When you kill the red enemies you will gain a Level Up, which evolves the player into a more advanced version, with slight improvements to mobility and attacks.

There are 4 Levels in this game, with difficulty of enemies increasing gradually, with endless gameplay.
